003package es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.corenlpentityextraction.xml.definition;
004
005import javax.xml.bind.annotation.XmlRootElement;
006
007import edu.stanford.nlp.pipeline.TokensRegexNERAnnotator;
008import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.xml.definition.AbstractProcessingStepParameter;
009
010/**
011 * Parameter for specifying the path to the file where the resulting NER
012 * mappings will be stored. These NER mappings relate terms present in the seed
013 * dictionaries and discovered terms with their named entity category, in a
014 * format ready to be parsed by {@link TokensRegexNERAnnotator}.
015 *
016 * @author Alejandro González García
017 */
018@XmlRootElement(name = "nerMappingsFile")
019public final class NERMappingsFileStepParameter extends AbstractProcessingStepParameter {}
